mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_도메인기본 조회 (DmnMapper.getDmn) */ SELECT com_std_dmn_nm ,sys_se_nm ,artcl_sou_nm ,com_std_dmn_clsf_nm ,com_std_dmn_group_nm ,com_std_dmn_expln ,dmn_type_nm ,dmn_len ,dmn_dcpt_len ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DMN" WHERE 1=1 AND com_std_dmn_nm = #{comStdDmnNm}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_도메인기본 수정 (DmnMapper.updateDmn) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DMN" SET sys_se_nm = coalesce(#{sysSeNm}, sys_se_nm) ,artcl_sou_nm = coalesce(#{artclSouNm}, artcl_sou_nm) ,com_std_dmn_clsf_nm = coalesce(#{comStdDmnClsfNm}, com_std_dmn_clsf_nm) ,com_std_dmn_group_nm = coalesce(#{comStdDmnGroupNm}, com_std_dmn_group_nm) ,com_std_dmn_expln = coalesce(#{comStdDmnExpln}, com_std_dmn_expln) ,dmn_type_nm = coalesce(#{dmnTypeNm}, dmn_type_nm) ,dmn_len = coalesce(#{dmnLen}, dmn_len) ,dmn_dcpt_len = coalesce(#{dmnDcptLen}, dmn_dcpt_len) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND com_std_dmn_nm = #{comStdDmnNm}
